name: AVPlayerMediaSelectionCriteria
desc: An object that specifies the preferred languages and media characteristics for a player.

items.name: init(preferredLanguages: [String]?, preferredMediaCharacteristics: [AVMediaCharacteristic]?)
items.desc: Creates media selection criteria with the preferred languages and media characteristics.

items.name: init(principalMediaCharacteristics: [AVMediaCharacteristic]?, preferredLanguages: [String]?, preferredMediaCharacteristics: [AVMediaCharacteristic]?)
items.desc: Creates media selection criteria with the principal media characteristics, and preferred languages and media characteristics.

items.name: var preferredLanguages: [String]?
items.desc: An array of language identifiers in preferred order.

items.name: var preferredMediaCharacteristics: [AVMediaCharacteristic]?
items.desc: An array of media characteristics in preferred order.

items.name: var principalMediaCharacteristics: [AVMediaCharacteristic]?
items.desc: An array of media characteristics that are essential to select when choosing media with a particular characteristic.
